no,Norway,Finance,6015,1,1533222919,Eika Mobilbank,Eika Gruppen AS,https://apps.apple.com/no/app/eika-mobilbank/id1533222919?uo=4,0.0,4.59469,30619,Finance,"Ta banken med deg i lommen.
Eika Mobilbank er for deg som er kunde i en av Eika Alliansens banker. Her kan du:

column2: Sjekke saldo og se alle transaksjoner
Betale regninger (også til utlandet) og overføre mellom kontoer
Få oversikt over hvor mye du har til overs frem til du får lønn
Samle forsikringer, lån og sparing på samme sted
Se kortet ditt digitalt, praktisk hvis du skal handle på nett
Legge til kortet ditt i Apple Lommebok
Gi oss tilbakemelding på hva du synes om mobilbanken
Enkelt kontakte banken på melding, telefon eller booke et møte

column1: Vi jobber hver eneste dag med å forbedre mobilbanken og tilby ny funksjonalitet. Derfor setter vi stor pris på tilbakemeldinger om hva du liker og hva du synes bør bli bedre.
Banken følger strenge krav til personvern og til behandling av personopplysninger. Du kan være trygg på at dine data er sikre og at vi jobber med sikkerhet som første prioritet.

no,Norway,Finance,6015,2,932493382,Revolut - Mobile Finance,Revolut Ltd,https://apps.apple.com/no/app/revolut-mobile-finance/id932493382?uo=4,0.0,4.78887,15981,Finance,"Join the 60+ million customers worldwide who use our app to spend, send, and save smarter.
This description is relevant for UK residents only.
Make your spend, well-spent
- Pay any way, with physical cards, virtual cards, single-use virtual cards for extra protection, Google or Apple Pay — you name it
- Spend abroad like a local with great exchange rates (fees additional to the rate provided may apply)
- Easily track and analyse your spending
- Link your external bank accounts to Revolut to stay on top of all your spending in one place
- Design a physical card you vibe with (fees may apply). Want to add a little luxury? Upgrade to Metal for a shiny steel card
- Not enough? Level up to Ultra to bag an exclusive platinum-plated card (Paid Plan T&Cs and subscription fees apply)
- Set your kids up for financial success. Get them a free Revolut ＜18 account, with their own card, so they can learn about money in a safe and fun way
Send money near, far, wherever they are
- Request or send 30+ currencies with a tap to anyone, anywhere
- Chat, send, and receive money, in one place. Whatever your plans, transfers are instant between your Revolut friends
- No more awkward money chats! Split, chat, and settle bills in one place. You can even share a fun GIF to diffuse any tension
Save the interest-ing way
- Grow your money in GBP, EUR, and USD, with annual interest paid daily, directly into your account
- Access your savings whenever you need to, with zero penalties or fees
- Build your savings effortlessly — set up recurring transfers and round up spare change to stash cash without even trying
Explore investments (Capital at risk. Content is for UK residents only)
- Start investing from $1 (other fees may apply)
- Choose from 2,000+ stocks to invest in some of the world's most popular companies
- Enjoy commission-free stock trading within your monthly allowance (other fees may apply)
- Access our trading Learn courses and quizzes

Investment services are provided by Revolut Trading Ltd (No. 11567840) which is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FRN: 933846). Registered address: 30 South Colonnade, London E14 5HX, United Kingdom.
End the overspend
- Get instant spending notifications to keep track of every payment
- Use smart budgeting and analytics tools to stop wondering where your money went, and start telling it where to go
- Worried about missing upcoming payments or subscription charges? Don’t be — we’ll notify you beforehand

Looking to go even further? Upgrade to one of our paid plans to get exclusive cards, more benefits, even cooler perks, you name it. Pick the plan that’s right for you: Plus, Premium, Metal or Ultra (Paid Plan T&Cs and subscription fees apply).
Unlock security features that you control
- Freeze and unfreeze your card in a tap
- Use single-use cards with details that regenerate each time, for an extra layer of protection
- Set spending limits and get notifications to keep track of your money
How we protect your money
- Your savings are protected by the FSCS through our partner banks – up to £85k. Subject to eligibility, visit the FSCS website for more information
- Our sophisticated fraud prevention system flags high-risk transactions and pings you an alert, so you can spot scams and nip ‘em in the bud
- It’s our business to protect your data, and we take it seriously. Extensive identity verification keeps sign-ups secure, and your account is protected with passcodes and biometrics
- We’re available 24/7 via our in-app customer support

Revolut Ltd (No. 08804411) is authorised by the Financial Conduct Authority under the Electronic Money Regulations 2011 (FRN: 900562). Registered address: 30 South Colonnade, London E14 5HX, United Kingdom.",2015-03-01T14:54:14Z,2025-11-20T16:41:08Z

no,Norway,Finance,6015,3,1286657804,Kron - Investering for alle,Kron AS,https://apps.apple.com/no/app/kron-investering-for-alle/id1286657804?uo=4,0.0,4.82775,6804,Finance,"I Kron fra Storebrand får du sparing, investering og pensjon i en veldig enkel app. Vi gjør gode investeringer tilgjengelig for alle, gjennom bruk av teknologi og ved å snakke et språk som er enkelt å forstå.
Kom i gang på noen minutter

Det tar bare noen få minutter å komme i gang med sparingen, og du trenger bare 300 kroner for å starte. Du svarer på noen spørsmål og får en personlig tilpasset investeringsplan basert på det som er viktig for deg - eller du kan velge selv blant nesten 500 ulike fond.
Vi holder deg oppdatert

I appen får du jevnlige små oppdateringer på nyheter og hvordan det påvirker investeringene dine. Er det noe du ikke finner svar på så har vi flinke folk som sitter klar på chatten til å hjelpe deg - uten at du må fekte bort irriterende chat-roboter først.
Norges mest fornøyde investeringskunder
Over 120.000 nordmenn er Kron-investorer. Vi har Norges mest fornøyde investeringskunder (ifølge EPSI, som måler kundetilfredshet blant norske spare- og investeringskunder).
no,Norway,Finance,6015,4,1165368803,Qliro,Qliro AB,https://apps.apple.com/no/app/qliro/id1165368803?uo=4,0.0,4.16615,2269,Finance,"Betala enkelt – och få mer på köpet med Qliro

Upplev en app som gör dina betalningar snabbare och smidigare än någonsin. Betala dina fakturor med full kontroll, oavsett om du vill betala allt direkt eller i din egen takt. Och om något går fel? Pausa fakturan med ett klick och hantera returen utan stress.

Men Qliro är mer än bara betalningar. När dina fakturor är betalda, hjälper vi dig att få ut mer av dina pengar. Våra sparkonton erbjuder konkurrenskraftig ränta och flexibilitet, så att du kan spara på dina villkor. Från små sparbelopp till större summor, låt dina pengar växa med Qliro.
Varför välja Qliro?
• Snabba och säkra betalningar: Logga in med BankID och betala tryggt varje gång.
• Enkel hantering av returer: Pausa fakturan, skicka tillbaka varan och vänta – vi sköter resten.
• Samlingsfaktura: Samla alla dina köp på en faktura och betala på det sätt som passar dig bäst.
• Attraktiva sparkonton: Få ränta på allt du sparar, oavsett belopp.
Ladda ner Qliro nu och upplev enkelheten i både betalning och sparande.",2019-08-31T04:07:16Z,2025-11-19T10:39:10Z

no,Norway,Finance,6015,5,1569382782,Walley,Norion Bank AB,https://apps.apple.com/no/app/walley/id1569382782?uo=4,0.0,4.32652,4303,Finance,"Med Walley-appen får du full koll på dina betalningar. Se vad som är betalt, vad som återstår och när det är dags för nästa. Vill du flytta fram ett betaldatum eller dela upp ett köp i mindre, mer hanterbara delar? Inga problem! Det gör du snabbt och smidigt direkt i appen, som dessutom är helt kostnadsfri att ladda ner och använda.
Det här kan du göra i Walley-appen:
Få full översikt över alla dina betalningar.
Flytta fram betaltiden direkt i appen.
Dela upp betalningen och betala i mindre delar.
Få notiser så att du aldrig missar en betalning.
Betala smidigt och snabbt med bara några klick.
Pausa en faktura vid retur, så slipper du betala i onödan.
Om Walley

Walley är en betallösning som används av 1000-tals e-handlare och butiker i Norden för att skapa köpupplevelser som känns smidiga och självklara. När du har hittat den där sällsynta vinylsamlingen, de robusta vandringskängorna eller den hypermoderna stektermometern, ska det vara enkelt att slå till. Därför har vi samlat alla betalsätt du kan tänkas behöva för att köpet ska bli så tryggt, flexibelt och krångelfritt som möjligt.

För när allt flyter på, och du kan betala på det sätt som passar dig och din plånbok bäst, kan det nästan kännas lite magiskt. Och det är precis så det ska vara.",2021-08-23T07:00:00Z,2025-11-24T08:18:34Z

no,Norway,Finance,6015,6,984380185,Vipps,Vipps MobilePay AS,https://apps.apple.com/no/app/vipps/id984380185?uo=4,0.0,4.75025,887143,Finance,"Hi, I'm Vipps! A very, very easy app for sending money and paying in the Nordics. Sending money (vippsing) is safe and done in a flash – just like it should be.
With Vipps, you can:
• send, receive and request money between Norway, Sweden, Denmark and Finland
• schedule gifts with digital wrapping
• pay online, in stores and at flea markets
• set up subscriptions and other recurring payments
• log into websites and apps
• create wish lists and collect money in a box
• settle costs like dinners and weekend getaways
• pay your bills (only in Norway)
• tap to pay on card terminals (only in Norway)
To use Vipps you need BankID, a Norwegian/Swedish phone number, a Norwegian/Swedish bank card and account, as well as an email address.
Vipps is available in English, Norwegian (bokmål and nynorsk), Swedish, Danish and Finnish.
Made in the Nordics, with love for making things very, very easy.",2015-05-30T16:18:18Z,2025-11-24T06:20:54Z

no,Norway,Finance,6015,7,283646709,"PayPal - Send, Manage, Pay","PayPal, Inc.",https://apps.apple.com/no/app/paypal-send-manage-pay/id283646709?uo=4,0.0,4.65156,15819,Finance,"There’s never been a better time to check out PayPal, the trusted way to pay
Say hello to PayPal+, our free loyalty programme that helps you make the most of your money every time you shop with PayPal
SEND & RECEIVE MONEY​
A simple, secure way to quickly send & receive money to friends and family. With encryption technology, we go the distance to help make sure your money transfers are secure
ITS LOYALTY FOR ALL. AND ITS ALL FOR FREE
PayPal+ is the loyalty programme that rewards you with more points, in more ways. Use them almost anywhere PayPal is accepted. And it’s all for free, with no fees and no caps*​

*Rewards are earned as points under the PayPal+ rewards programme. To start earning, you must be enrolled in PayPal+. If you are not yet enrolled, you can sign in the PayPal app. PayPal+ Terms and conditions apply.
MULTIPLY YOUR POINTS WITH THE PAYPAL DEBIT CARD​

Earn up to 10x PayPal+ points when you pay with your PayPal Debit Card, everywhere Mastercard® is accepted. Add it to your mobile wallet, use it in person, and at PayPal checkout to watch your points grow*​
* Set up and activation required. Terms and conditions apply
BUY NOW, PAY LATER​
Keep track of all your PayPal Pay in 3 repayments.* Plus, earn points whenever you use Pay in 3
*Pay in 3 subject to status. Unregulated credit. Available for purchases £20-£3000. Consider if affordable and impact on other borrowing
SEND MONEY GLOBALLY
Send money to friends and family abroad in over 110 countries – or get even more delivery options with Xoom
*Fees and restrictions apply. Transaction, currency conversion, and other fees may apply
MANAGE YOUR SUBSCRIPTIONS ​

Keep track of your different subscriptions at the subscription hub. Easily view, update, or cancel subscriptions, while enjoying updates on recurring payments. Manage recurring payments all in one place.
POOL MONEY TOGETHER​
Collect money in advance for group gifts, shared experiences, and more and skip the hassle of reimbursement afterward.​
*An account with PayPal is required to create a Pool. Terms and limits apply
PAY HOW YOU WANT​
Add your debit or credit cards* or link your bank accounts for extra flexibility at checkout. You’ll even be able to continue collecting rewards points**

*Using your credit card through your PayPal wallet may impact your rights under Section 75 of the Consumer Credit Act. This means you may lose the right to hold the merchant or your credit card provider jointly liable if you don’t get the goods or services you paid for (if they cost between £100 and £30,000)​
**Subject to issuer’s applicable reward programme terms and conditions

PayPal UK Ltd is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) as an electronic money institution (firm reference number 994790); in relation to its regulated consumer credit activities (firm reference number 996405); and for the provision of cryptocurrency services (firm reference number 1000741). Some products and services, such as PayPal Pay in 3 and PayPal Working Capital, are not regulated by the FCA and may offer a lower level of protection. Please read product terms for further details. PayPal UK Ltd's company number is 14741686. Its registered office is 5 Fleet Place, London, United Kingdom, EC4M 7RD",2019-02-03T08:00:00Z,2025-11-17T16:24:16Z
no,Norway,Finance,6015,8,6741155189,Avida,Avida Finans AB (Publ),https://apps.apple.com/no/app/avida/id6741155189?uo=4,0.0,1.27472,91,Finance,"Ha full kontroll över ditt kreditkort - direkt i mobilen
Med vår app får du alltid tillgång till ditt kreditkort - när och var du vill. Följ din ekonomi i realtid, hantera kortinställningar och gör vardagen enklare.
I appen kan du:
- Se saldo och tillgänglig kredit
- Följa transaktioner och delbetalningar

- Frysa eller spärra kortet med ett knapptryck
- Beställa ett nytt fysiskt kort
- Se vilka försäkringar som ingår
Ladda ner appen och få full kontroll över ditt kreditkort – snabbt, säkert och enkelt.",2025-08-18T07:00:00Z,2025-11-19T09:56:17Z

no,Norway,Finance,6015,9,345038631,Nordnet: Stocks & Funds,Nordnet Bank AB,https://apps.apple.com/no/app/nordnet-stocks-funds/id345038631?uo=4,0.0,4.56125,37794,Finance,"Nordnet's products and services are available in Denmark, Finland, Norway and Sweden. With Nordnet's award-winning app, investing in stocks, funds, and ETFs is easier than ever. In the app you can track your progress and what is happening on the stock market. It's completely free to download and use the app.
• We offer trading in stocks, funds, and other securities at low fees on several of the world's largest exchanges.
• Discover new investments through top and theme lists, articles, and current campaigns.
• See discussions about investing and specific stocks and funds from our users.
• Follow your holdings and the stock market's development in real-time.
GET STARTED IN THREE MINUTES.
Create an account directly in the app. Deposit your money easily and secure to start trading and investing.
LOW FEES FOR TRADING AND INVESTING.
Always low fees regardless of how little or much you trade. Choose the commission class that fits your trading.
AUTOMATIC MONTHLY INVESTING.
Save automatically each month in funds. Get help choosing a fund plan that suits you.
WIDE RANGE OF STOCKS AND FUNDS.

Choose from thousands of stocks and funds on multiple exchanges around the world. Get inspired by other investors' stock holdings or choose funds based on your savings goals: sustainable, low fees, or highest returns.
REAL-TIME PRICE ALERTS.
Get a push notification when your watched stocks and other securities reach the level you have set.
WATCHLISTS.

Find your next investment through our watchlists. Choose industries that interest you and then get lists of instruments within those themes. Use it as inspiration to find new investments or to keep an eye on exciting companies. You can also create your own watchlists.
LISTEN AND READ REPORTS WITH QUARTR.

In partnership with Quartr, you can easily keep track of your favorite stocks by listening to company presentations during quarterly and annual reports. You can also download reports and presentations in text format.
INTERACTIVE GRAPHS.
Compare your investments with relevant indexes and see how you perform over time. See features for more advanced investors, such as trading volume and candlesticks.
SAFE AND EASY.
Log in with Touch-ID or Face-ID. Hide your balance if you, for example, want to log in in public environments.
ABOUT NORDNET.
We are a leading Nordic digital broker for savings and investments with over 2 million customers in Sweden, Finland, Norway, and Denmark.

Through innovation, simplicity, and transparency, we challenge traditional structures and give private savers access to the same information, tools, and services as professional investors. Welcome to Nordnet.",2010-01-21T08:00:00Z,2025-11-18T20:34:22Z

no,Norway,Finance,6015,10,390631214,DNB Mobile Bank,DNB ASA,https://apps.apple.com/no/app/dnb-mobile-bank/id390631214?uo=4,0.0,4.6845,230488,Finance,"Our banking app will give you a complete overview of your finances. You can access and manage your money quickly and easily.
PAYMENTS
- Swipe to pay and transfer money.
- Left to spend – get an estimate of how much money you will have left when all upcoming payments are done.
- Scan bills – no more KID!
SPENDING
- Get an overview of where your money goes.
- Categorise payments and upload receipts.
- Get an overview of your subscriptions.
CARDS AND ACCOUNTS
- Get an overview of your cards, accounts and balances.
- Add accounts from other banks and make payments in the app.
- Block and unblock your cards or order a new one.
LOANS
- See your DNB pre-qualification letter in the app.
- View your student loan from Lånekassen on the Loans & credit page.
- View your mortgage details and make additional down-payments.
- Check your car’s value and loan details.
- Apply for a consumer loan.
CURRENCY CONVERTER
- Get the latest foreign exchange rates.
- Use location-based currency when traveling abroad.
FUN STUFF!
- DNB Balance Peek (widget) – check your account balances without logging in to the app.
- Siri support.
- Haptics (active touch).
- Customised themes for different loyalty programs.
We are constantly working to improve the app with new features and upgrades. Please enjoy!
Our terms and conditions: https://www.dnb.no/en/global/generelle-vilkar.html",2010-09-13T20:34:21Z,2025-11-17T13:12:10Z

no,Norway,Finance,6015,13,463742159,SpareBank 1 Mobilbank,Sparebank 1 Utvikling DA,https://apps.apple.com/no/app/sparebank-1-mobilbank/id463742159?uo=4,0.0,4.63992,264182,Finance,"The Mobile Bank application from SpareBank 1 gives you easy access to the most used banking and insurance services when you are on the go. In addition, the app gives you an easy way to contact us.

The Mobile Bank app provides full control over your accounts, cards, payments, savings, loans and insurance policies - and of course, you can order a variety of services and products. We will launch new services throughout the year. The app also includes insurance claims, your travel insurance card and you can contact our real estate broker.
The Mobile Bank must be activated with BankID. After activation you can use a self made PIN, Face ID or Touch ID to sign in.
We love comments and feedback. Please contact us through social media or customer service center.
If you are not a customer with SpareBank 1, you can easily become a customer in the app.",2011-09-26T07:00:00Z,2025-11-11T10:47:30Z

no,Norway,Finance,6015,14,1621020173,Budget Planner App - Fleur,Akash Jain,https://apps.apple.com/no/app/budget-planner-app-fleur/id1621020173?uo=4,0.0,4.73913,69,Finance,"Fleur is a cute and simple budget planner and tracker app. The app allows you to easily add daily expenses and income. You can also set a monthly budget, create multiple accounts and track your debt. Fleur is an all in one app that will help you manage your money.
Key Features:
- Minimal, elegant, and aesthetically pleasing design
- Easily log expenses and income
- Set a monthly budget
- View insights and understand spending habits
- View transaction history
- Add repeating transactions
- Create new categories
- iCloud sync
- No sign in required
- Easy search and filter
Read more about our Terms & Conditions and Privacy Policy here:
https://fleurbudget.com/privacy_terms.html
We are always there for you!
- If you are facing any issues or have questions, please feel free to email us. Hope you enjoy using our app as much as we do! :)",2022-05-22T07:00:00Z,2025-11-18T05:29:15Z

no,Norway,Finance,6015,17,1571757427,Swiipr,Swiipr Technologies  LTD,https://apps.apple.com/no/app/swiipr/id1571757427?uo=4,0.0,0,0,Finance,"Swiipr enables you to access your money instantly; anywhere, anytime and directly at your time and place of need. Whether it be a refund, compensation, a welfare payment, corporate load payment or gift, simply click the link in your text message to download this app and follow the instructions to add the funds into your Apple Wallet. You will then be able to easily and securely use your money for contactless payments and more.

Swiipr Technologies is a global technology and services provider helping businesses automate and streamline operations to deliver queue-less, self-service and contactless fund disbursements to end customers. We believe in digitization that matters; empowering people and businesses with a mobile first approach that builds trust and accountability between stakeholders and helps sustainability pledges by reducing paper and plastic consumption, human touch points, manual intervention and outdated processes.",2021-07-30T07:00:00Z,2025-08-20T10:21:01Z

no,Norway,Finance,6015,18,1542108249,Firi - Buy Bitcoin & Ethereum,Firi AS,https://apps.apple.com/no/app/firi-buy-bitcoin-ethereum/id1542108249?uo=4,0.0,4.61489,10057,Finance,"Buy, sell and save in Bitcoin, Ethereum, and a variety of other cryptocurrencies with Firi.
EASY TO BUY AND SELL CRYPTO

Firi is a Nordic cryptocurrency exchange. We offer a variety of well-known cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Solana (SOL), Cardano (ADA), Dogecoin (DOGE), Chainlink (LINK) and more. We are constantly working on adding more cryptocurrencies. Trading takes place easily and seamlessly in the app, and you also get access to advanced trading on our platform at firi.no.
FIXED SAVINGS AND INVESTMENT IN CRYPTOCURRENCY

With our “Kryptosparing” savings agreement, you can set up a savings plan and save regularly in one or more optional cryptocurrencies. This is an excellent investment strategy for both beginners and advanced investors, because you reduce risk by spreading the purchases over a longer period. This strategy is also known as DCA, or ""Dollar Cost Averaging"". Firi gives you an exciting alternative to saving in funds and stocks.
EARN EXTRA CRYPTO WITH FIRI REWARD (FIRI FORDEL)

With our loyalty program, “Firi Fordel”, you can earn extra crypto while trading crypto or using our app. For example, you earn 100 kroner in bitcoin for each friend you invite with your referral code. We can offer multiple rewards and contests where you can earn free cryptocurrency through our app.
Firi also enables crypto staking where you can earn an interest income on your cryptocurrency. You can read more about staking in the Firi app.
DONT'T WORRY ABOUT YOUR CRYPTO WALLET.

To make it safe and easy for you to get started with investing in crypto, we will take care of all your crypto wallets for you. Investors using Firi can rest assured that their critical digital assets are being protected by the highest level of security on the market.
LOW FEES

The Firi app is completely free, and it is also free to deposit FIAT and cryptocurrency to Firi. When you buy and sell cryptocurrency, we charge a fee of only 0.7%, and we have low prices on withdrawals of cryptocurrency and FIAT. There are no hidden fees when you buy crypto with Firi. See our complete price list here: https://firi.com/about/transactions-and-fees
THE MARKET'S BEST SECURITY SOLUTIONS
Firi never takes any risk with our customers' funds and we do not touch your funds unless you specifically ask us to do so.

We also secure and insure customers' funds through our partnership with Fireblocks, which is a cryptocurrency security platform. Fireblocks' wallet infrastructure is based on what is called Multiparty Computation (MPC), a cryptographic technology that allows the user to split and distribute private keys across multiple locations, so that customer funds are always protected.

Your crypto cannot be hacked. We store most of the keys to the customer funds cold at all times, i.e. cold storage, which means that they are in no way accessible from the internet or in any way connected to other computers. This is also the safest way to store crypto.
FOLLOW YOUR PORTFOLIOS CLOSELY
In the app, you can follow the development of your crypto portfolio and get an overview of the distribution between different cryptocurrencies.
EASY CRYPTO TAX WITH FREE TAX CALCULATOR

Calculating the tax on crypto investments can seem complicated. Fortunately, Firi makes this process as easy as possible with our tax calculator that calculates the tax for you. We give you the numbers you must enter in the tax return, and attach the document you must deliver to the tax authorities.
NOTE: Crypto prices change all the time. Prices shown in the screenshots here will not necessarily correspond to the current price at this time.
ABOUT FIRI

In 2019, Firi was registered with Finanstilsynet as a service provider for the exchange and storage of virtual currency in Norway. We are also registered with Finanstilsynet in Denmark.",2021-01-09T08:00:00Z,2025-08-14T07:45:16Z

no,Norway,Finance,6015,20,374040427,Gjensidige,Gjensidige Forsikring ASA,https://apps.apple.com/no/app/gjensidige/id374040427?uo=4,0.0,4.49943,1762,Finance,"With the Gjensidige app you have easy access to check all of your insurances, report claims, and download travel insurance cards. What you can do in the app
* Full overview of your insurances
* Download travel cards to your mobile
* Report damages

* Find out what you will be paid in pension in total, and what you can do to influence what you will receive
* Check prices and buy insurance
* Log in with BankID
* Contact Gjensidige customer service, or leave your telephone number and we will call you back
* Do you have a suggestion for what the app can do better? Send us feedback inside the app!

Your safety is very important to us. We respect your privacy and do everything we can to secure and protect your personal information, information about use of the app and other communication via mobile. A complete overview of privacy and security can be found at https://www.gjensidige.no/personvern-og-sikkerhet",2010-06-01T18:21:17Z,2025-11-18T07:58:53Z

no,Norway,Finance,6015,23,882415097,Nordea Mobile - Norway,Nordea Bank Abp,https://apps.apple.com/no/app/nordea-mobile-norway/id882415097?uo=4,0.0,4.4347,150563,Finance,"Welcome to Nordea!
The app puts the entire bank in the palm of your hand, enabling you to do most of your banking swiftly, smoothly and securely.
You can test the demo version of the app without logging in. You can access it through Menu before logging in. All information in the demo version is fictitious.
Examples of what you can do in the app:
YOUR OVERVIEW

In the Overview tab, you can view and manage all your finances in one place. You can add, hide or rearrange the order of your content to personalise your experience. Quick actions take you straight to several functions, such as Search, helping you find what you need. If you have other banks, you can also add them to get a better overview of your finances.
PAYMENTS AND TRANSFERS

Pay your bills and transfer money, both between your own accounts or to a friend. It is possible to transfer money from another bank from your own account if you have one in a different bank.  Here, you can also add and manage both e-invoices and direct debits, simplifying your everyday life.
MANAGE YOUR CARDS

Connect cards and wearables to Apple Pay for contactless payments. If you forgot your PIN-code, you can view it here. You can also block your card if needed, and we’ll send you a new one automatically. Choose the geographic areas where your credit card can be used and by restricting use for online shopping so you can feel safer and better control of your payments.
SAVINGS AND INVESTMENTS

It’s easy to keep track of your savings and see how they are performing. Start saving monthly, trade in funds and stocks, or set a goal for your savings. Get suggestions and ideas for new investments through Find Investments.
DISCOVER NEW PRODUCTS AND SERVICES
In the Services tab, you can open different accounts, apply for credit cards or loans, get digital advice for long-term savings, and much more.
GET BETTER CONTROL OF YOUR FINANCES

The Insights tab gives you a clear overview of your income and expenditure. Your spending is divided into categories to give you a deeper understanding where your money is going. Here, you can make your own budgets to make it easier to plan and keep track of your expenditure. Nevertheless, you can also keep track on your subscriptions and easily stop the ones that you no longer use.
WE'RE HERE FOR YOU

The Help tab contains all the information you need to get help with your banking. Use the Search function, see frequently asked questions and answers, or chat with us directly. If you call us through the app, you’ve already identified yourself, so we can help you faster.
We want to know what you think, so feel free to leave a review or send your feedback directly in the app. For more information, you’re welcome to contact us or visit nordea.no/mobilbank.
Download the app today and get access to all the functions that simplify your banking!",2014-06-12T03:17:36Z,2025-11-12T06:00:07Z
